prompts: You are an oncologist specialized in head and neck cancer. Describe a treatment plan for the patient and your reasoning. Be specific in your treatment plan for each treatment modality. If surgery is involved, describe the surgery in detail; if radiotherapy is involved, describe radiation quality, techniques, fractions, and schedule; if chemotherapy is involved, describe the chemo drug used and schedule. Your reasoning should be described for each treatment modality.

Pay attention to specific biomarkers such as HPV or p16 status. Discuss or suggest personalized treatment options based on these biomarkers other than standard of care treatment. What alternative treatments can be considered?
If you are drawing suggestions from clinical trials, provide the trial name, phase, and the results that support your suggestion, along with all necessary citations.

Predict their post-treatment outcomes for overall survival, locoregional recurrence, distant metastasis, progression-free survival, and disease-free survival. Provide the time-to-event (using right censoring if needed), and the x-year probability with confidence intervals.
